response.overview: This poetically narrated animation reveals how the Coronavirus pandemic has highlighted divisions within Indian society—with one class of people confined to the comfort of their homes whilst others struggle on the streets. Drawing inspiration from images of thousands of migrant workers walking home from locked down cities—and one particular group who, exhausted, were run over by a train as they slept on the tracks—the film is at heart a prayer for kindness in our strange new world.
response.title: TASVEER
